original_text: Then Caiaphas stood up in front of everyone. He said to Jesus, ‘You must reply now to what these men have said against you. Are the things that they are saying true?’
korean_text: 대제사장이 가운데 일어서서 예수에게 물어 이르되 너는 아무 대답도 없느냐 이 사람들이 너를 치는 증거가 어떠하냐 하되

sentences.original_text: to what these men have said against you
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들이 당신에 대해 말한 것에

sentences.original_text: Are the things that they are saying true?
